alert.note: Alert for Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 20 at 2:45PM MDT until July 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR GUSTY NORTHWEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY WEDNESDAY FOR PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL WYOMING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417 AND 418... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 417. Fire weather zone 418. * WIND...Northwest to north-northwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts 25 to 35 mph possible. * HUMIDITY...Afternoon humidity 10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland
